body:
Hi there,
Thanks for the response. Yes, I am talking about the latest release on  
the Radiance download page. I am using Linux (Fedora 8). If you could  
compare the compiled package for linux with that for Mac OS, you would  
see that there are about 80 less programs for the linux version.  
Including ximage and pvalue. Moreover, if one compiles the source  
package (for linux), using makeall install, the resulting package of  
executable files still lacks the above mentioned ones.
Any other suggestions?
katja






On Jun 20, 2008, at 7:07 PM, Rob Guglielmetti wrote:
___
